name: Sophia Fahner
bio:
FAHNER Lydia Wein
died Mar. 31, 1944 aged 63 yrs.
wife of Henry Fahner
died Nov. 19, 1964
aged 86 yrs.
their daughter Emma
wife of Rose Krueger
died June 5, 1979 aged 67 yrs.
(back)Tobias Fahner
died Aug. 20, 1906
aged 67 yrs.
Gone but not forgotten
Sophia his wife
died Apr. 14, 1924 aged 74 yrs.
at rest
